title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 505.15 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 505.15 - Severability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part are severable. If any clause, sentence, paragraph, subdivision or part is adjudged invalid by a court of
competent jurisdiction, the effect of such order or judgment is confined to the
controversy in which it was rendered. Such order or judgment does not affect or
invalidate any other provisions of this Part or their application to other
persons and circumstances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
505.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
